name: nmsg-rpc
description: RPC event based router for JavaScript bi-directional messaging

scripts.mypublish: npm run dist && npm run typing && git add -A && git commit -m "Publishing" && npm version patch && git push -u origin master && npm publish
scripts.start: npm i -g tsd mocha webpack uglify-js && tsd install node && tsd install mocha && tsd install chai
scripts.dist: npm run dist-build && npm run dist-min
